intro: Cynoglossum officinale f. hybridum, commonly known as hybrid forget-me-not, is a cultivated form of the common forget-me-not. It is a flowering plant in the Boraginaceae family, characterized by its blue to purple flowers and heart-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and thrives in moist, well-drained soils. It is often used in gardens for its ornamental value and can be found in both wild and cultivated settings. Its flowers bloom in late spring to early summer, attracting pollinators such as bees and butterflies.
